knimeNode.name: Keras Select Output Layers
knimeNode.shortDescription: Select the output layers of a Keras model.

fullDescription.intro: Changes the output tensors of the Keras deep learning model. The new outputs must be selected in the node configuration.

tab.name: Output Selection
tab.option: Add an output tensor to the list of selected outputs. A dialog will be shown that allows to select which tensor should be added.
Remove the particular output from the list of selected outputs.

ports.outPort: A Keras deep learning network with the selected outputs.
